ai-patthana18.15:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.15:1.1_0: for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of the teaching ...
ai-patthana18.15:3.1_0: ‘... for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of defilement.’ ...
ai-patthana18.15:4.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
